uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Order

  • public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an individual order stored within 'orderArray' inside Till . Contains an array list of OrderItem representing all the Pizza/Drink/Sides in an order.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Order()
      Instantiates a new order.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(Item item, int quantity)

      void updateItemQuantity(Item item, int quantity)
      Locates and accesses a specified item that requires a quantity change in 'itemArray', before changing the quantity of that item, and re-calculating the price of that item using the new quantity value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Order

        public Order()
        Instantiates a new order. Creates a new array list of OrderItem used to store all items added to order.

      • createNewPizza

        public void createNewPizza(Size size,
                  PizzaType type,
                  int quantity)
        Creates a new Pizza object using data retrieved from the GUI. This new Pizza is then added to the 'itemArray' array list.
        Parameters:
        size - The selected size of the new pizza - Represented by Size
        type - The selected type of the new pizza- Represented by PizzaType
        quantity - The selected quantity of the new pizza item

      • createNewDrink

        public void createNewDrink(Size size,
                  DrinkType type,
                  int quantity)
        Creates a new Drink object using data retrieved from the GUI. This new Drink is then added to the 'itemArray' array list.
        Parameters:
        size - The selected size of the new drink - Represented by Size
        type - The selected type of the new drink- Represented by DrinkType
        quantity - The selected quantity of the new drink item

      • createNewSide

        public void createNewSide(Size size,
                 SideType type,
                 int quantity)
        Creates a new Side object using data retrieved from the GUI. This new Side is then added to the 'itemArray' array list.
        Parameters:
        size - The selected size of the new side - Represented by Size
        type - The selected type of the new side- Represented by SideType
        quantity - The selected quantity of the new side item

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item item,
           int quantity)
        Creates a new OrderItem object using the Pizza/Drink/Side object created, before adding it to the 'itemArray' array list. Calls the Discount class to check and apply any discounts now valid.
        Parameters:
        item - The item created previously (either Pizza, Drink or Side).
        quantity - The quantity of that new item.

      • getItemQuantity

        public int getItemQuantity(int i)
        Gets the quantity of a specific item in 'itemArray'
        Parameters:
        i - The index of 'itemArray' where the specified item is located
        Returns:
        The quantity of a specified item

      • getSubTotal

        public java.math.BigDecimal getSubTotal()
        Loops through all items in 'itemArray' to calculate and return the sub total of the entire order.
        Returns:
        The order sub total

      • updateItemQuantity

        public void updateItemQuantity(Item item,
                      int quantity)
        Locates and accesses a specified item that requires a quantity change in 'itemArray', before changing the quantity of that item, and re-calculating the price of that item using the new quantity value.
        Parameters:
        item - The selected item that requires a quantity change.
        quantity - The new quantity value that is to be set.
